item.title: Be Humble
item.description: I our fast paced, appearance driven society it can be tempting to seek status above everything else. But what does the Bible say about humility? He leads the humble in justice, And He teaches the humble His way. Psalm 25:9 NASB Lift yourself up with pride and you will soon be brought low, but a meek and humble spirit will add to your honor. Proverbs 29:23 TPT Humble yourselves before the Lord, and he will lift you up in honor.
